page.title: 14Church and Chapel in Well
page.content: Well is part of a united benefice the parishes of West Tanfield,Well with Snape and North Stainley.The rector lives in West Tanfield and comes to Well every Wednesday.The monthly rota is:1st Sunday 9.30 Family Communion 2nd Sunday 6.30 Evensong 3rd Sunday 10.00 Family Service 4th Sunday 6.30 Family Communion 5th Sunday 10.00 Joint service at each of four churches in turn. {The Methodist Chapel} is in the Ripon and Masham circuit - 7 chapels in each. The superintendant minister who lives in Masham,tries to preach here every 4-6 weeks. The other services are taken by lay preachers.The services are alternatively - Sunday afternoon 2pm - Sunday evening 6pm. {Nosterfield} has Sunday School in the morning and a service each Sunday at 2pm.
